mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.TITLE, C.WRITER_ID, C.CNT FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN USER U ON C.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.WRITER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY C.ID DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET ${startNum}
SELECT COUNT(C.ID) FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN USER U ON C.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.WRITER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT COMMU.TITLE, C.CONTENT, C.WRITER_ID, C.DATE, C.ID, C.BOARD_ID FROM COMMENT C JOIN ( SELECT CO.ID, CO.TITLE, CO.WRITER_ID, CO.CNT FROM COMMUNITY CO JOIN USER U ON CO.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE CO.WRITER_ID = #{userId} ) AS COMMU ON C.BOARD_ID = COMMU.ID ORDER BY C.DATE DESC, C.ID DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{startNum}

SELECT COUNT(C.ID) FROM COMMENT C JOIN (SELECT CO.ID, CO.TITLE, CO.WRITER_ID, CO.CNT FROM COMMUNITY CO JOIN USER U ON CO.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE CO.WRITER_ID = #{user_id} )AS COMMU ON C.BOARD_ID = COMMU.ID ORDER BY C.DATE DESC
